Package org.globus.opensaml11.md.common.provider

Class Summary
AQHNameIdentifierMapping Base class for NameIdentifierMapping implementations that support Shibboleth Attribute Query Handles.
BaseNameIdentifierMapping Base class for processing name identifier mapping configuration.
BasicTrust Trust implementation that validates against standard inline keying data within SAML 2 metadata.
CryptoShibHandle NameIdentifierMappingimplementation that uses symmetric encryption to store principal data inside Shibboleth Attribute Query Handles.
PrincipalNameIdentifier NameIdentifierMappingimplementation to use when the SAML name identifier format matches the Shibboleth internal representation of the principal.
SharedMemoryShibHandle NameIdentifierMappingimplementation that uses an in-memory cache to store mappings between principal names and Shibboleth Attribute Query Handles.
ShibbolethTrust Trust implementation that does PKIX validation against key authorities included in shibboleth-specific extensions to SAML 2 metadata.
X509SubjectNameNameIdentifierMapping NameIdentifierMapping implementation that translates principal names to E-Auth compliant X509SubjectNames.
